about_the_game:
DLC Content:
- Full naked body mode unlocked when beat each level twice or above
- Added multiple language support (subtitle only): Simplified Chinese, Japanese, English
- Gallery now has total 20 pictures of original images and full naked body version

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
